explanation: [0-0] In a desert game scene, a character wearing white clothing and a gold helmet, carrying a sniper rifle, is running. The character has a sniper rifle on their back. There is a red building to the right of the character. Above is a black caption "AWM M16" with a red cross in the middle and a white check mark on a green background to the right.

[0-8] The camera switches to a first-person perspective, where the player is holding a sniper rifle and aiming at a shadow next to a building in the distance. The player fires a shot and then switches back to a third-person perspective, continuing to run forward. The player switches to another gun, aims at an enemy in red clothing behind a wooden fence in the distance, and fires. A white caption appears above: "Restricting the Play Area in 10s". The game interface shows that the player successfully eliminated the enemy. The player then switches back to a third-person perspective and continues running forward in the desert map.
